snippet: The punishment for the man, Cao Haibo, 27, comes after he criticized the ruling Communist Party in online messages and for sought to establish an opposition party.
lead_paragraph: The punishment for the man, Cao Haibo, 27, comes after he criticized the ruling Communist Party in online messages and for sought to establish an opposition party.

headline.seo: Chinese Cafe Owner Given 8-Year Sentence Over Online Messages
headline.main: Chinese Cafe Owner Given 8-Year Sentence Over Online Messages
headline.print_headline: Chinese Cafe Owner Given 8-Year Sentence Over Online Messages
